wikipedia_page.main: Maurice Beddow Bayly  (26 March 1887 – 22 June 1961) was an English physician, anti-vivisection activist, and anti-vaccination campaigner.

response: * 1936, The Case Against Vaccination, Maurice Beddow Bayly.
* 1939, The Schick Inoculation Against Diphtheria, Maurice Beddow Bayly
*Maurice Beddow Bayly (died 1962), English physician, anti-vivisection activist, and anti-vaccination campaigner
